decisions.what: No code merges allowed during Nov 26-28 (Black Friday/Cyber Monday) and Dec 24-Jan 4 (Christmas & New Year) for web repo
decisions.date: Discussion date not specified, applies to Nov-Jan period
decisions.context: Web repo is not opted out for No Deployment Days, so squads must respect these blackout periods and schedule deployments around them

decisions.what: UEZ4PRFKM will approve PRs for Approved Deployment Days during peak
decisions.date: For Monday deployment (context suggests peak period)
decisions.context: Approved Deployment Days require Tribe Lead approval and 'peak-approved' label for services not using Progressive Delivery or on Opt-In list

decisions.what: Use ACT-A-8 (Subscription flexibility) KR for BNL migration IT Cap reporting
decisions.context: No specific KR existed for BNL migration work, needed generic enough KR that isn't cancelled or done for capitalization purposes

decisions.what: Continue using TAM-A-14-VMS for Factor Form Shopify initiative IT Cap reporting
decisions.context: Consistent with previous month's reporting approach

decisions.what: Defer Zest UI2 adoption completion until brand refresh in second half of 2026
decisions.context: ~60 files still need updates per brand; external agency brand refresh won't kick off until second part of 2026, so Zest migration should align with that effort

decisions.what: WoCo team legally requires secure, private rooms; no quick solution to meeting space shortage
decisions.context: Ground floor quiet area being subleased for cost-saving; smart building limitations prevent quick creation of additional meeting rooms

key_context.summary: No code merges allowed during Black Friday/Cyber Monday (Nov 26-28) and Christmas/New Year (Dec 24-Jan 4). Approved Deployment Days during peak require Tribe Lead approval with 'peak-approved' label and updated PR templates including risk assessments.
key_context.relevance: Critical for ensuring system stability during high-traffic periods; affects all squad deployment planning

key_context.summary: Platform team requires all squads to document alerts and monitoring dashboards in peak readiness spreadsheet by Dec 5th. This ensures adequate observability during peak traffic periods.
key_context.relevance: Mandatory compliance requirement; helps validate system stability monitoring capabilities

key_context.summary: 3rd floor meeting room shortage due to WoCo occupying two large rooms (Panna Cotta, Gulab Jamun) while ground floor being subleased. Immediate solution is increased Mezzanine usage; mid-term solution involves Mezzanine improvements and additional phonebooths.
key_context.relevance: Impacts daily operations and team collaboration; will worsen significantly when full team returns in 2026

key_context.summary: Teams need to map work to active KRs for IT Cap reporting. BNL migration mapped to ACT-A-8 (Subscription flexibility), Factor Form Shopify to TAM-A-14-VMS. Cannot use DONE or CANCELLED KRs for capitalization.
key_context.relevance: Required for monthly financial reporting and proper cost capitalization of development work

key_context.summary: ~60 files per brand still need Zest UI2 updates. Migration deferred until brand refresh with external agency in H2 2026. New components use Zest, but legacy components remain unmigrated.
key_context.relevance: Technical debt that will need addressing during rebranding; affects UI consistency and maintainability

key_context.summary: Tribe leadership creating survey to understand how members use GenAI and how to better support them. Feedback requested on survey length and question framing before broader distribution.
key_context.relevance: Helps identify opportunities to improve developer productivity and AI tool adoption

summary: New Ventures tribe coordinating peak season deployment restrictions, completing mandatory peak readiness documentation by Dec 5th, addressing critical 3rd floor meeting room shortage, managing IT Cap reporting with proper KR attribution, and deferring Zest UI2 migration until H2 2026 brand refresh.
